001
002import java.io.File;
003
004/**
005 * rename files
006 *
007 * @author matecsaba
008 */
009public class renamer {
010
011    /**
012     * the main
013     *
014     * @param args arguments
015     */
016    public static void main(String[] args) {
017        String prepend = "";
018        String remover = "";
019        boolean really = true;
020        boolean basic = false;
021        for (int i = 1; i < args.length; i++) {
022            String s = args[i].toLowerCase();
023            if (s.equals("prepend")) {
024                i++;
025                prepend = args[i] + " ";
026            }
027            if (s.equals("remover")) {
028                i++;
029                remover = args[i] + " ";
030            }
031            if (s.equals("noremover")) {
032                remover = "";
033            }
034            if (s.equals("noprepend")) {
035                prepend = "";
036            }
037            if (s.equals("demo")) {
038                really = false;
039            }
040            if (s.equals("really")) {
041                really = true;
042            }
043            if (s.equals("extended")) {
044                basic = false;
045            }
046            if (s.equals("basic")) {
047                basic = true;
048            }
049        }
050        String s = args[0];
051        playerUtil.put("reading " + s + "...");
052        String[] l1 = new File(s).list();
053        int tried = 0;
054        int failed = 0;
055        for (int i = 0; i < l1.length; i++) {
056            s = l1[i];
057            String a = guessName(prepend + s, basic);
058            a = guessName(a, basic);
059            a = guessName(a, basic);
060            if (a == null) {
061                playerUtil.put("no guess to " + s);
062                continue;
063            }
064            if (a.startsWith(remover)) {
065                a = a.substring(remover.length(), a.length()).trim();
066            }
067            if (a.equals(s)) {
068                continue;
069            }
070            playerUtil.put(s + " --> " + a);
071            tried++;
072            if (!really) {
073                continue;
074            }
075            try {
076                new File(args[0] + s).renameTo(new File(args[0] + a));
077            } catch (Exception e) {
078                failed++;
079            }
080        }
081        playerUtil.put(l1.length + " files, " + tried + " need renaming, " + failed + " failed.");
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * path separator
086     */
087    public final static String sep = "/";
088
089    /**
090     * guess name
091     *
092     * @param s string to use
093     * @param basic guess mode
094     * @return guessed name
095     */
096    public static String guessName(String s, boolean basic) {
097        if (s == null) {
098            return null;
099        }
100        if (s.length() < 1) {
101            return null;
102        }
103        if (s.startsWith(".")) {
104            return null;
105        }
106        if (s.indexOf(sep) >= 0) {
107            return null;
108        }
109        s = s.replaceAll("Ã¡", "a");
110        s = s.replaceAll("Ã", "a");
111        s = s.replaceAll("Ã©", "e");
112        s = s.replaceAll("Ã", "e");
113        s = s.replaceAll("Ã­", "i");
114        s = s.replaceAll("Ã", "i");
115        s = s.replaceAll("Ã³", "o");
116        s = s.replaceAll("Ã", "o");
117        s = s.replaceAll("Ã¶", "o");
118        s = s.replaceAll("Ã", "o");
119        s = s.replaceAll("Ãº", "u");
120        s = s.replaceAll("Ã", "u");
121        s = s.replaceAll("Ã¼", "u");
122        s = s.replaceAll("Ã", "u");
123        s = s.replaceAll("_", " ");
124        s = s.replaceAll("â", "-");
125        s = s.replaceAll("  ", " ").trim();
126        s = s.replaceAll("- \\.", "- ").trim();
127        String a = "";
128        for (;;) {
129            if (s.length() < 1) {
130                break;
131            }
132            int i = s.indexOf(" ");
133            String b;
134            if (i < 1) {
135                b = s;
136                s = "";
137            } else {
138                b = s.substring(0, i);
139                s = s.substring(i, s.length()).trim();
140            }
141            b = b.trim();
142            if (b.length() < 1) {
143                continue;
144            }
145            if (b.length() > 1) {
146                b = b.substring(0, 1).toUpperCase() + b.substring(1, b.length()).toLowerCase();
147            }
148            a += " " + b;
149        }
150        s = a.trim();
151        if (basic) {
152            return s;
153        }
154        int p = -1;
155        for (int i = s.length(); i >= 0; i--) {
156            if (isDate(s, i)) {
157                p = i;
158            }
159        }
160        if (p < 0) {
161            return s;
162        }
163        a = s.substring(p, p + 4);
164        s = s.substring(0, p) + sep + s.substring(p + 4, s.length());
165        s = doAlign(s);
166        if (s.endsWith(sep)) {
167            s = s.substring(0, s.length() - 1);
168            int i = s.indexOf("-");
169            if (i < 1) {
170                return null;
171            }
172            s = s.substring(0, i) + sep + s.substring(i + 1, s.length());
173        }
174        s = doAlign(s);
175        s = s.replaceAll(sep, " - " + a + " - ").trim();
176        return s;
177    }
178
179    private static String doAlign(String s) {
180        s = s.trim();
181        for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
182            s = s.replaceAll(" " + sep, sep).replaceAll(sep + " ", sep);
183            s = s.replaceAll("\\[" + sep, sep).replaceAll(sep + "\\]", sep);
184            s = s.replaceAll("\\(" + sep, sep).replaceAll(sep + "\\)", sep);
185            s = s.replaceAll("-" + sep, sep).replaceAll(sep + "-", sep);
186        }
187        return s.trim();
188    }
189
190    /**
191     * test if this is a date
192     *
193     * @param s string to use
194     * @param p position
195     * @return true on success
196     */
197    public static boolean isDate(String s, int p) {
198        int i;
199        try {
200            s = s.substring(p, p + 4);
201            i = Integer.parseInt(s);
202        } catch (Exception e) {
203            return false;
204        }
205        if (i < 1970) {
206            return false;
207        }
208        if (i > 2020) {
209            return false;
210        }
211        return true;
212    }
213
214}
